021import dev.dejvokep.boostedyaml.YamlDocument;
022import net.tnemc.core.EconomyManager;
023import net.tnemc.core.TNECore;
024import net.tnemc.core.account.Account;
025import net.tnemc.core.account.holdings.HoldingsEntry;
026import net.tnemc.core.api.response.AccountAPIResponse;
027import net.tnemc.core.currency.Currency;
028import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
029import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.log.DebugLevel;
030import org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable;
031
032import java.io.File;
033import java.io.IOException;
034import java.math.BigDecimal;
035import java.util.Optional;
036import java.util.Set;
037import java.util.UUID;
038
039/**
040 * Extractor
041 *
042 * @author creatorfromhell
043 * @since 0.1.2.0
044 */
045public class Extractor {
046
047  public static boolean extract() {
048
049    final File file = new File(PluginCore.directory(), "extracted.yml");
050
051    //check to see if file exists, if it does we are going to move it to the extracts directory.
052    if(file.exists()) {
053      final File directory = new File(PluginCore.directory(), "extracted");
054      if(!directory.exists()) {
055
056        directory.mkdir();
057      }
058
059      final String fileName = "extracted-" + (directory.listFiles().length + 1) + ".yml";
060
061      file.renameTo(new File(directory, fileName));
062    }
063
064    try {
065      file.createNewFile();
066    } catch(IOException e) {
067      PluginCore.log().error("Failed to create extraction file.", e, DebugLevel.STANDARD);
068      return false;
069    }
070
071    YamlDocument yaml = null;
072    try {
073      yaml = YamlDocument.create(file);
074    } catch(IOException e) {
075      PluginCore.log().error("Failed load extraction file for writing.", e, DebugLevel.STANDARD);
076      return false;
077    }
078    final int total = TNECore.eco().account().getAccounts().values().size();
079    final int frequency = (int)(total * 0.10);
080    int number = 1;
081
082    yaml.set("Version", "0.1.2.0");
083
084    for(final Account account : TNECore.eco().account().getAccounts().values()) {
085
086      for(final HoldingsEntry entry : account.getWallet().entryList()) {
087
088        String username = account.getName();
089        username = username.replaceAll("\\.", "!").replaceAll("\\-", "@")
090                .replaceAll("\\_", "%");
091
092        yaml.set("Accounts." + username + ".Balances." + entry.getRegion() + "."
093                 + entry.getCurrency() + "." + entry.getHandler().asID(), entry.getAmount().toPlainString());
094
095        yaml.set("Accounts." + username + ".id", account.getIdentifier());
096      }
097      number++;
098      try {
099        final boolean message = (number % frequency == 0);
100
101        if(message) {
102          final int progress = (number * 100) / total;
103          PluginCore.log().inform("Extraction Progress: " + progress);
104        }
105      } catch(Exception ignore) { }
106    }
107
108    try {
109      yaml.save();
110      PluginCore.log().inform("Extraction has completed!");
111    } catch(IOException e) {
112      PluginCore.log().error("Failed to save extraction file.", e, DebugLevel.STANDARD);
113      return false;
114    }
115    return true;
116  }
117
118  public static boolean restore(@Nullable final Integer extraction) {
119
120    final File file;
121
122    if(extraction != null && extraction > 0) {
123      file = new File(PluginCore.directory(), "extracted/extracted-" + extraction + ".yml");
124    } else {
125      file = new File(PluginCore.directory(), "extracted.yml");
126    }
127
128    if(!file.exists()) {
129
130      PluginCore.log().inform("The extraction file doesn't exist.");
131      return false;
132    }
133
134    YamlDocument extracted = null;
135
136    try {
137      extracted = YamlDocument.create(file);
138    } catch(IOException e) {
139      PluginCore.log().error("Failed load extraction file for writing.", e, DebugLevel.STANDARD);
140      return false;
141    }
142
143    if(extracted.contains("Accounts")) {
144      final Set<Object> accounts = extracted.getSection("Accounts").getKeys();
145
146      final int frequency = (int)(accounts.size() * 0.10);
147      int number = 1;
148
149      final boolean recode = extracted.contains("Version");
150
151      for(final Object nameObj : accounts) {
152
153        final String name = (String)nameObj;
154
155        final String username = name.replaceAll("\\!", ".").replaceAll("\\@", "-").replaceAll("\\%", "_");
156
157        final String id = extracted.getString("Accounts." + name + ".id");
158
159        final AccountAPIResponse response = TNECore.eco().account().createAccount(id, username);
160        if(!response.getResponse().success() || response.getAccount().isEmpty()) {
161          PluginCore.log().inform("Couldn't create account for " + username + ". Skipping.");
162        }
163
164        final Set<Object> regions = extracted.getSection("Accounts." + name + ".Balances").getKeys();
165        for(final Object regionObj : regions) {
166
167          final String region = (String)regionObj;
168          final Set<Object> currencies = extracted.getSection("Accounts." + name + ".Balances." + region).getKeys();
169          for(final Object currencyObj : currencies) {
170
171            final String currency = (String)currencyObj;
172            if(!recode) {
173              final String finalCurrency = (currency.equalsIgnoreCase("default"))? TNECore.eco().currency().defaultCurrency(region).getIdentifier() : currency;
174              final Optional<Currency> cur = TNECore.eco().currency().find(finalCurrency);
175
176              PluginCore.log().inform("Currency avail: " + cur.isPresent());
177              if(cur.isPresent()) {
178                final BigDecimal amount = new BigDecimal(extracted.getString("Accounts." + name + ".Balances." + region + "." + currency));
179
180                PluginCore.log().inform("Set Balance to: " + amount.toPlainString());
181                response.getAccount().get().setHoldings(new HoldingsEntry(region, cur.get().getUid(),
182                                                                          amount, EconomyManager.NORMAL));
183              } else {
184                final BigDecimal amount = new BigDecimal(extracted.getString("Accounts." + name + ".Balances." + region + "." + currency));
185
186                PluginCore.log().inform("Use default currency");
187                PluginCore.log().inform("Set Balance to: " + amount.toPlainString());
188                response.getAccount().get().setHoldings(new HoldingsEntry(region, TNECore.eco().currency().defaultCurrency(region).getUid(),
189                                                                          amount, EconomyManager.NORMAL));
190              }
191            } else {
192
193              final Set<Object> types = extracted.getSection("Accounts." + name + ".Balances." + region + "." + currency).getKeys();
194              for(final Object typeObj : types) {
195
196                final String type = (String)typeObj;
197                final BigDecimal amount = new BigDecimal(extracted.getString("Accounts." + name
198                                                                             + ".Balances." + region
199                                                                             + "." + currency + "."
200                                                                             + type));
201
202                response.getAccount().get().setHoldings(new HoldingsEntry(region, UUID.fromString(currency),
203                                                                          amount, Identifier.fromID(type)));
204              }
205            }
206            number++;
207            try {
208              final boolean message = (number % frequency == 0);
209
210              if(message) {
211                final int progress = (number * 100) / accounts.size();
212                PluginCore.log().inform("Restoration Progress: " + progress);
213              }
214            } catch(Exception ignore) { }
215          }
216        }
217      }
218      PluginCore.log().inform("Restoration has completed!");
219    }
220
221    return true;
222  }
223}
